Author: jspook16#3059

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is not the spam that is the issue, it is any popular dapp that uses millions of gas. each instruction costs gas, so that is why ETH tx numbers are so high, you run one contract and it counts as many transactions

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for KMD, a CC transaction is just 1 transaction

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: with 1 txfee, denominated in that chain

Author: jspook16#3059
Content: crypto kitties..

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes, if any single dapp gets mainstream popular, ETH becomes saturated and gas prices go up for everyone

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is built into the design

Author: jspook16#3059
Content: i guess when crypto dragons come around kmd wont have that issue

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: at worst the cryptodragons chain might bog down (if it reaches 5000+ tx/block) but no other chain would be affected

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the KMD design is a dedicated chain for each dapp

Author: jspook16#3059
Content: is there already a crytpodragon chain? interesting i didnt know that. so each dapp would have its own tokens?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: a hypothetical cryptodragon chain

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: unless the cryptodragon team likes to pay txfees in some other chain, it would seem they would just launch their own dedicated chain. that is why I made it so easy to launch a new chain
